external_games.name: Luigi Doesn't Drink A Glass of Milk

name: Luigi Doesn't Drink A Glass of Milk
summary: Mario is missing. At the same time, the milk factory has seen a massive sudden boost in productivity. His brother, left in the dark, knows that there is some kind of connection... and so, one fateful night, Luigi heads off to discover the truth.

collections.name: Mario Drinks A Glass of Milk
